details.name: Pura FIS
details.remarks:
As reported by the AEE, Irrigation Bijni Sub Division, Due incessant and heavy rainfall raised the water level of Pura FIS a flash flood occurred on 05-07-2024 under Bijni Sub Division (Irrigation). 
1. Damaged at U/S Left side of Spillway structure
2. Scouring near left side abutment wall.

details.name: Kuklung FIS
details.remarks:
As reported by the AEE, Irrigation Bijni Sub Division, Due incessant and heavy rainfall raised the water level of Kuklung FIS a flash flood occurred on 05-07-2024 under Bijni Sub Division (Irrigation). The Afflux Bund and River training works are damaged at 1. Ch. 0.00m D/S Left (Length - 6.00m, Breadth- 7.00m, Depth- 4.00m)
2. Ch. 70.00m D/S Left ( Length- 12.00m, Breadth- 15.00m, Depth- 4.00m)
3. Ch. 130.00m U/S Left (Length- 10.00m, Breadth- 3.50m, Depth- 4.00m).

details.name: Nalatol PWSS
details.remarks:
Several sections of the pipeline (both Gl and HDPE ) have been broken due to the force of the floodwaters. Soil erosion has exposed large sections of the pipeline, increasing the risk of further damage and contamination. Many pipeline joints have been displaced, causing leaks and reducing the system's overall efficiency. Supporting structures, including pipeline supporting pillars, have been damaged or washed away.
Date 13/07/2024

details.name: Tamulaghuli to Ligiramukh Chanong gaon road
details.remarks: Due to rise of flood water of river Luit, the culvert which was built under Missing Autonomous Council was washed away on 01/07/2024

details.name: 16 MILE TINIALI TO DAMBUKIAL ROAD
details.remarks: DUE TO RISE OF FLOOD WATER OF RIVER LUIT, COMMUNICATION HAS BEEN CUTOFF AT 16 MILE TINIALI TO DAMBUKIAL ROAD OF LUIT KHABOLU REGION ON 2-07-2024 (.)16 MILE TINIALI TO DAMBUKIAL ROAD WAS BREACHED BY FLOOD WATER AT THE LOCATION OF AN EXISTING CULVERT AT CH 500.00M (.) THE CULVERT WHICH WAS BUILT BY MISSING AUTONOMOUS COUNCIL WAS WASHED AWAY ALONG WITH THE CULVERT APPORACHES ON BOTH SIDE (.) THIS ROAD LED TO THE KARKO DOLEY ME SCHOOL WHICH IS THE ONLY ME SCHOOL OF THE REGION (.) THE COMPLETE ROAD LENGTH FROM CH 0M TO 2100M IS IN SUBMERGED STATE
